request.title: Courses Equalize
request.note_text1: Conditions for equivalence of the preparatory semester materials
request.note_text2: The university in which the subject was studied must be recognized by the Ministry of Education
request.note_text3: The estimate of the subject to be equivalent is (good) and above.
request.note_text4: The description of the subject being studied matches the subject for equivalence.
request.note_text5: That the study of the material be in a regular manner.
request.note_text6: Not more than five years have passed since the period to be equivalent.
request.note_text7: The student should accompany a detailed and certified description of the course required to be equivalently only.
request.note_text8: The course description should match the course code and number in the academic record.

reset.note5: Password should contain at least one lower case character.
reset.note6: Password should contain at least one number.
reset.note7: Password should not contain your first name.
reset.note8: Password should not contain your last name.
reset.note9: Password should not be from last 5 passwords.

policy.title: Conflict Of Interest Policy
policy.desc: The Saudi Electronic University (SEU) has defined a Conflict of Interest Policy to preserve society's trust and to protect its integrity and its academic reputation. This policy shall apply on all employees, staff and faculty members, and on all existing relationships. SEU has developed all necessary procedures in this regard, which includes the method for disclosing any conflict of interest and the evaluation process that will be implemented to ensure non-bias justifiable decisions.
policy.info_details: To view the content of the policy and related forms
policy.no_conflict: I acknowledge reading and understanding the SEU Conflict of Interest Policy and I hereby declare that I have no conflict  of interests.
policy.has_conflict: I acknowledge reading and understanding the SEU Conflict of Interest Policy and I may have a conflict of interest and I will follow the announced disclosure procedure.
policy.notes: * Scroll down the appended policy to activate the options below.

exams.title: eExam Instructions
exams.desc:
The reason behind switching to eExam as an alternative to paper-based testing is that the feedback it provides contributes to exam development, as well as the availability of helpful tools during the exam such as multimedia, calculator and many others.
eExam can measure the outcomes of educational programs and prepare a direct analysis of the students' performance in the exam.

GuidelinesList.title: Technical requirements for operating laptops/tablets: for eExam
Taking eExam using Desktop/Laptop Computers (Windows & Mac)
